tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm Jayakumari. Recently I was suffering from post menopausal bleeding and I got to know that there were multiple cysts in the uterus through a scan. So I visited Dr.Shobha ma'am at St. Philomena's hospital. She found out the exact problem in the uterus by doing hysteroscopy. The cysts were removed and sent for biopsy testing and she found out that it was a benign stromal nodule which was the problem. So finally she performed hysterectomy on me and removed the uterus solving all my health problems. *** ** ** ****** *** ** ********* ****** *** *************. She took really good motherly care and motivated me warding off all my fear. She's a kind hearted and good human being. God bless her and her entire team of doctors, to continue this service for life and save many more people like me.
Thank you so much ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
No proper response from her, I expected she will be really nice and observe the patients with full interest, but she is not.
She is **** ********* *** carefree in looking at the pregnant woman, she doesn't show interest and don't listen to your problems.
She just talk to her assistants and let her assistants talk o that the pregnant woman.
*** ** ******** ********** * ********* ******* *** *** *** ****** ******* ** *** ******** ****** **** * **** **** * ******* **** 
Very bad never expected this behaviour from her.
* **** ************* ****** ***** ****** ** *** ******** ******* *** **** ****** *********** *** ********** *********** *** she is least bothered *** *** **** ***** ** *** *** **** ****** ** *** ******** **** * ******* ****** ** ******There is no Motherly or comfort feeling **** ***** ************** **** **** *** **** ** **** *** ****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience has been really bad, I was seeing her from the 3rd month of my pregnancy, there are about 2 to 3 patients in the consultation room at one time, no individual attention given and my attenders have never been called inside. She just vaguely talks to you and she didn't guide me properly due to which I had a preterm delivery and also lost my baby. I kept asking her if it is necessary for stiches to be put as my cervix was weak. But she never paid attention. I lost my baby. If you want proper guidance, then never go to this hospital, they are a bunch of money machines

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
An expert in treating high-risk pregnancies, with more than 20 years of experience and expertise in her field. It is because of her blessed and able hands that me and my baby are safe and healthy today after a difficult and a risky labour. I am extremely thankful to her. A patient listener, friendly, approaches patient's problems well. 
Would highly recommend her for a safe and happy recovery.
It was good. She is a good listener and follow the basic principles of medicine very well. Quite happy with her approach to address the problem.
very comfort and caring experience with dr. shobha gudi, she very responsible *** ************* *** i recommend her to every women .
Very caring and friendly doctor I have visited.. I had high risk pregnancy ( preeclampsia) she took care so well throughout my pregnancy. Now me and my baby both are healthy and happy
*** ** *** **** ************* **** ********** a very friendly behaviour...and a best person during labor with lots of CO operation...

We visited her last week, she in unprofessional in her approach and treats two patients at a time. She talks vaguely *** ****** ******** ****** We never felt comfortable with her. She talked very rudely which made my wife very upset and she almost cried. We called it quits just after consulting her one time. We don't recommend her.
